name: Helping Santa
description:
Made for the Extra Credits Holiday 2018 Game Jam.

The theme "present" was taken literally, used mostly to justify the christmas aesthetic.

In this game you take control of an elf while he shoots with his bazooka the missing presents to the children through their windows. The progress is done by delivering presents to all the children who are still awake waiting for Santa's delivery.

Controls:
* Movement and aiming with WASD or Arrow Keys
* Run by holding the Shift or X keys
* Jump with Space or the C key
* Dash with Ctrl key
* Shooting with the Z key or LMB
